XRFrame.summary: A WebXR Device API XRFrame object is passed into the callback function and provides access to the information needed in order to render a single frame of animation for an describing a VR or AR scene. Events which communicate the tracking state of objects also provide an XRFrame reference as part of their structure.

remarks.para: In addition to providing a reference to the for which this frame is to be rendered, the method is provided to obtain the describing the viewer's position and orientation in space, and can be used to create an describing the relative position of one relative to another.
